name: Silver pieces
details: A small bag filled with silver coins

name: Brew of finer Dmg
details: Drink to gain +2 dmg to your next damage roll

name: Brew of finer Str
details: drink  to gain  +5 str to your next d100 dice roll

name: Brew of finer Dex
details: drink  to gain  +5 dex to your next d100 dice roll

name: Brew of finer Int
details:
Drink
  to gain
  +5 int to your next d100 dice roll

name: Objective item
details:
An 'objective item' is found that may be required for a quest (check the current quest’s
  details). if it’s not needed for the quest, it is instead a “fine item” worth 100gp

name: Brew of finer Def
details: Drink to gain +2 def on a monsters next damage roll

name: Finer armour
details: Roll on table A (armour) and add “finer” before its name, it gains +0.2 def

name: Finer weapon
details: Roll on table w – weapon and add “finer” before its name, add +1 to its dmg

name: Silver pieces
details: A small bag filled with silver coins

name: Potion of finer str
details: Drink to gain +5 str until you next shade a 🕐 on the time track

name: Potion of finer dex
details: Drink to gain +5 dex until you next shade a 🕐 on the time track

name: Potion of finer int
details: Drink to gain +5 int until you next shade a 🕐 on the time track

name: Potion of finer remove poison
details: Drink to remove up to 4 shaded pips on the poison track

name: Potion of finer healing
details: Drink to restore up to 8 lost HP
